            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%83%A8%E5%88%86%E5%B8%82%E5%8E%BF%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%A4%E9%80%9A%23&amp;from=default">#湖北部分市县恢复公共交通#</a>】近日，湖北省内低、中风险地区逐步恢复公共交通出行：荆州公交车辆一趟一消毒，每辆车载客人数不超过核载人数的50％；十堰450台公交车早中晚分时段营运；宜昌乘客需凭身份证和健康码乘车。此外，孝感城区因工作、生活确有出行需要的私家车，实行单双号通行。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyVHY02Ls" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483249860010630:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483249860010630&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%8F%E8%BF%87%E8%BF%99%E6%AE%B5%E6%97%A5%E5%AD%90%E6%89%8D%E7%9F%A5%E9%81%93%E6%AD%A3%E5%B8%B8%E5%A6%82%E6%AD%A4%E7%8F%8D%E8%B4%B5%23&amp;from=default">#经过这段日子才知道正常如此珍贵#</a> 网友：愿生活早日恢复如初！】白岩松：尤其让我们高兴的是，越来越多的患者可以回到正常的诊疗当中。在度过了这段不正常的日子之后，我们才知道正常是如此的珍贵。谢谢所有的医护人员，也给患者们加油！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483247482784311:1034-video:1034%3A4483245774143492:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483247482784311:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zpbrIv" alt="http://t.cn/A6zpbrIv" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6572939914&amp;cid=4483247758748201&amp;nick=是四环ya&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 23:37</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%B0%81%E4%B9%9F%E6%97%A0%E6%B3%95%E7%8B%AC%E5%96%84%E5%85%B6%E8%BA%AB%23&amp;from=default">#抗击疫情谁也无法独善其身#</a>】白岩松：有人说，在这场防疫之战中，中国打上半场，世界来打下半场。但不管你在哪个半场，不管你是谁，都应该团结一心，一起抗疫，因为谁也没法独善其身。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483243061653048:1034-video:1034%3A4483242972348434:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483243061653048:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zpyE21" alt="http://t.cn/A6zpyE21" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483239248424042" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyVqQzltE?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 23:03" date="1584370994000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483239248424042:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 23:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%A4%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%8B%E4%B8%9A%E5%8D%95%E4%BD%8D%E7%A9%BA%E7%BC%BA%E5%B2%97%E4%B8%BB%E8%A6%81%E6%8B%9B%E8%81%98%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#今明两年事业单位空缺岗主要招聘高校毕业生#</a>】近日，中央组织部办公厅、人力资源社会保障部办公厅印发通知，要求加大事业单位面向高校毕业生的公开招聘力度，今明两年事业单位空缺岗位主要用于专项招聘高校毕业生（含择业期内未落实工作单位的高校毕业生）。其中，湖北省事业单位可以面向湖北省高校 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyVqQzltE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483239248424042:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483239248424042&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483232357463375" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyVfJvjz1?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 22:35" date="1584369351000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483232357463375:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 22:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%BF%9D%E5%8D%AB%E6%88%98%E5%B7%B2%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E6%94%B6%E5%B0%BE%E5%86%B2%E5%88%BA%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉保卫战已进入收尾冲刺阶段#</a> 加油！】国家卫健委医政医管局监察专员焦雅辉：2月18日，武汉的在院患者是28000多人，重症加在一起有9000多人，那时的累计治愈率只有9.9%。今天的在院患者还有8200多人，重症和危重症加在一起2800多人，累计治愈率已达到75.3%。所以，可以说我们现在已经进入到了冲刺 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyVfJvjz1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483232357463375:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483232357463375&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 22:36</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94%E7%BB%B4%E4%BA%9A%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%9F%E6%B1%82%E5%8A%A9%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#塞尔维亚总统求助中国#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94%E7%BB%B4%E4%BA%9A%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%9F%E8%AF%B4%E5%8F%AA%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%83%BD%E5%B8%AE%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%23&amp;from=default">#塞尔维亚总统说只有中国能帮我们#</a>】15日晚，塞尔维亚总统武契奇宣布全国进入紧急状态，以应对新冠肺炎疫情蔓延，并向中方寻求援助。他说，“欧洲的团结是不存在的”,是“童话”，并赞扬中国，称中国是唯一向塞尔维亚提供帮助的国家。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483229794721686:1034-video:1034%3A4483229726474275:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483229794721686:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zpvX0u" alt="http://t.cn/A6zpvX0u" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

                                <a name="4483227752052267" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyV8j8BT5?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 22:17" date="1584368253000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483227752052267:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 22:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23104%E5%B2%81%E8%80%81%E5%A5%B6%E5%A5%B6%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#104岁老奶奶康复出院#</a> 转发，恭喜奶奶！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“奶奶，换双新袜子，恭喜您出院啦！”今天下午，湖北武汉，104岁高龄的李奶奶（化名）经12天精心治疗出院。武汉市三医院光谷院区的医生，为李奶奶换上新袜子，并送上玫瑰花恭喜她康复出院。看视频↓转发祝福！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483227752052267:1034-video:1034%3A4483187959857198:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483227752052267:2656274875" title="长江日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zN6EhF" alt="http://t.cn/A6zN6EhF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>长江日报的微博视频</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=长江日报">@长江日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2736165433&amp;cid=4483224393095669&amp;nick=带着相机吃天下要过CPA&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 22:04</div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483217673881133" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyUS3ghEV?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 21:37" date="1584365850000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483217673881133:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 21:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%82%A1%E4%B8%A4%E5%91%A8%E4%B8%89%E6%AC%A1%E7%86%94%E6%96%AD%23&amp;from=default">#美股两周三次熔断#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%82%A1%E5%86%8D%E6%AC%A1%E7%86%94%E6%96%AD%23&amp;from=default">#美股再次熔断#</a>】美国三大股指16日开盘暴跌，标普500指数跌幅超过7%，触发熔断机制，停盘15分钟。这是美股两周以来第三次熔断。投资机构纷纷对市场前景表示悲观，高盛预测，下跌远未结束，预计标普500指数可能从最高点下跌41%至2000点左右。（央视记者王逢治） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyUS3ghEV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483217673881133:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483217673881133&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IyUOylSQD&amp;mid=4483215505215727&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcw3arbts0j20u01hcqv7" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>383</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>
                                                    <li class=" curr">
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4483215505215727"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>330</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                <li class="">

                        <div class="WB_handle W_fr">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483208667848042" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyUDwwVDk?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 21:01" date="1584363703000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483208667848042:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 21:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%231%E5%A4%A9%E5%86%853%E5%9B%BD%E5%90%91%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B1%82%E6%8F%B4%23&amp;from=default">#1天内3国向中国求援#</a>】当地时间15日，塞尔维亚总统武契奇宣布全国进入紧急状态，并将寻求中方援助；同一天，国务委员兼外长王毅应约同西班牙外交大臣、菲律宾外长分别通电话时，两国均提出“希望中方伸出援手，提供医疗物资支持”。而中国近日向意大利派出的医疗专家组，也正在分享中国经验。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyUDwwVDk" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483208667848042:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483208667848042&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483204956796202" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyUxxsw0a?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 20:46" date="1584362818000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483204956796202:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 20:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E5%9C%A3%E7%81%AB%E5%B0%86%E5%9C%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%8C%89%E5%8E%9F%E8%AE%A1%E5%88%92%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%92%23&amp;from=default">#奥运圣火将在日本按原计划传递#</a> 火炬手原则上不戴口罩】据日本放送协会消息：东京奥组委表示，圣火传递将在日本按原计划进行，预计在3月26日从福岛县出发。据悉，福岛县内有310名火炬手，东京奥组委向火炬手们发送邮件介绍，原则上不戴口罩，但提出要求也允许戴口罩；体温超37.5度不能参加圣火传递 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyUxxsw0a" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483204956796202:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483204956796202&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2127144420&amp;cid=4483205035659900&amp;nick=一路诗来&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 20:47</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 20:30</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483197141816157" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyUkW7CsR?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 20:15" date="1584360955000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483197141816157:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 20:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%E5%AF%B9%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%96%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%E4%B8%80%E8%A7%86%E5%90%8C%E4%BB%81%23&amp;from=default">#入境防控措施对中外公民一视同仁#</a>】今天，外交部发言人耿爽表示，中国各地对入境人员采取有关的检验、检疫和防控措施是防控需要，可以有效阻止疫情的跨国传播，也是对中外公民生命安全和身体健康负责。有关措施对外国公民和中国公民一视同仁，各地方也会充分照顾当事人的一些合理关切，为他 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyUkW7CsR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483197141816157:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483197141816157&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【直播！“小石榴”回家5天了！看<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E7%9F%B3%E6%A6%B4%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%A2%E8%81%9A%E6%97%B6%E5%85%89%23&amp;from=default">#小石榴一家的团聚时光#</a>】“小石榴”已经回家5天了。宝宝回家后，他们一家的生活发生了什么变化？爸爸妈妈还在家里给宝宝洗了个“回家澡”，小家伙是否听话？戳直播↓见证一家三口的幸福生活。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483192390217631:1034-video:1034%3A4483214085914639:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483192390217631:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zNaJne" alt="http://t.cn/A6zNaJne" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E1053%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗单日新增新冠肺炎1053例#</a> 累计确诊14991例】根据伊朗卫生部最新消息，当地时间16日，伊朗新增新冠肺炎确诊病例1053例，新增死亡129例。截至当天中午，伊朗累计确诊新冠肺炎病例14991例，其中4996例康复，853例死亡。(总台记者李健南 倪紫慧) ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%90%AF%E7%94%A8%E5%B0%8F%E6%B1%A4%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#北京启用小汤山医院#</a> 应对境外输入】北京市疫情防控领导小组决定，今天起启用小汤山医院，主要用于境外来（返）京人员中需筛查人员、疑似病例及轻型、普通型确诊患者治疗。北京小汤山医院设床位1000余张，主要用于北京海关检疫后有风险人员的进一步医学筛查。目前，小汤山医院扩建区域的病房设施、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyU5Bzlrw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483187638423910:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483187638423910&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 19:39</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%88%B6%E5%AE%9A%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%88%86%E6%89%B9%E6%92%A4%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#制定方案组织援鄂医务人员分批撤离#</a>】今天，中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组召开会议。会议指出，要分类细致有序做好疫情防控后续工作，武汉和湖北要精心制定方案，其他地区要根据国家制定的原则稳妥做好相关工作，各地要及时足额兑现防控一线人员补助。制定方 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyTXCAXOp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483182688809729:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483182688809729&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E7%97%85%E5%8F%B2%E8%87%B455%E4%BA%BA%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%90%8E%E8%A2%AB%E5%88%A4%E5%88%91%23&amp;from=default">#隐瞒病史致55人隔离患者治愈后被判刑#</a>】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E9%87%91%E5%B1%B1%E6%B3%95%E9%99%A2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=上海金山法院">@上海金山法院</a> 对被告人李某某妨害传染病防治案进行公开开庭审理。李某某因在新冠肺炎疫情期间妨害传染病防治，被判处有期徒刑一年三个月，缓刑一年六个月。李某某当庭认罪认罚。1月底，李某某就出现咳嗽等症状，但就诊中却隐瞒从重点地区返沪事实，还 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyTTCmJ26" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483180205416326:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483180205416326&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IyTQdqfIM&amp;mid=4483178096256964&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>111</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>
                                                    <li class=" curr">
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4483178096256964"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>103</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E5%B7%B2%E8%B6%85%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#中国以外新冠肺炎确诊病例数已超中国#</a>】世界卫生组织16日消息，中国以外新冠肺炎累计确诊病例数已超过中国累计确诊病例数。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IyTEca9Ku&amp;mid=4483170642420758&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcvy5b7rxuj20go0gogvn" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>245</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#宁夏实现确诊病例清零#</a>】今天下午4时，宁夏最后2名新冠肺炎确诊患者出院，宁夏确诊病例清零。宁夏确诊的75例新冠肺炎患者现已全部治愈出院，实现<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E7%8E%87100%25%23&amp;from=default">#宁夏治愈率100%#</a>。不仅如此，宁夏还实现了疑似病例清零、密切接触者清零、医务人员零感染、确诊病例零死亡。（总台央视记者 赵钱江 许国飞） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E9%86%89%E9%A9%BE%E8%87%B4%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E8%A2%AB%E6%89%B9%E6%8D%95%23&amp;from=default">#男子醉驾致医疗队员死亡被批捕#</a>】据湖北省荆州市荆州区人民检察院：13日，犯罪嫌疑人黄某酒后驾车造成交通事故，致中央指导组防控组驻荆州防控队队员、广东支援湖北荆州医疗卫生队队员王烁死亡、李某某受伤。后经检测，黄某酒精测试结果为151.5mg/100ml。目前，黄某已以交通肇事罪被批捕，该案正在 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyTs8hKCp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483163164230781:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483163164230781&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483160219374687" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyTnnDkMD?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 17:49" date="1584352152000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483160219374687:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 17:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E8%87%B3%E6%B8%A9%E5%B7%9E%E5%BC%80%E9%80%9A%E4%B8%B4%E6%97%B6%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%23&amp;from=default">#意大利至温州开通临时航班#</a>】浙江省在意大利侨胞众多，为便于确需回国的侨胞和留学生出行，中国民航开通了从意大利米兰至浙江温州的临时航班。今天13:50，国航CA082航班载着125位乘客抵达温州龙湾机场，乘客中大多是温州、丽水等地的侨胞和留学生。相关部门已对所有乘客进行了健康检疫，并采取医学 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyTnnDkMD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483160219374687:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483160219374687&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E7%97%85%E6%83%85%E7%94%B1%E7%BE%8E%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%E5%B7%B2%E8%A2%AB%E7%AB%8B%E6%A1%88%E4%BE%A6%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#女子隐瞒病情由美返京已被立案侦查#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安北京">@平安北京</a> ，3月13日，北京报告1例从美国输入的确诊病例黎某（女，37岁），其在美期间已出现发热、咳嗽等症状，并多次在当地就诊，登机前曾服用退烧药，登机后未如实向乘务人员提供个人健康状况及丈夫、儿子等同行人员情况。北京警方以涉嫌妨害传染病防治罪， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyTm477kh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483159401696461:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483159401696461&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%B6%8516%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球累计确诊新冠肺炎超16万例#</a>】世卫组织实时统计数据显示，截至欧洲中部时间16日0时（北京时间16日7时），全球新冠肺炎确诊病例累计达到164837例，死亡病例6470例，已报告病例的国家和地区达146个。(总台记者朱赫) ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%8D%86%E5%B7%9E%E6%98%8E%E8%B5%B7%E6%92%A4%E9%99%A4%E5%9F%8E%E5%8C%BA%E5%8D%A1%E5%8F%A3%23&amp;from=default">#湖北荆州明起撤除城区卡口#</a>】荆州市政府发布第18号通告，自17日0:00起，荆州中心城区范围现有内设交通卡口全部撤除，恢复正常交通秩序；部分产业可按规定复工复产；有序解除小区封闭管控状态，居民可分时、错峰正常进出所在小区。详情，戳↓↓ ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/qiaojianchengy" usercard="id=3249131564">绿叶的小学生</a>：湖北除武汉外其他地区已经陆续可以办理手续出省返工了，且已隔离50余天，上海等地都能接收，然而北京还是一味强调所有湖北人未经允许不得入京。是否可安排湖北低风险地区安全、逐步、有序、合理返京？哪怕回京后继续隔离。没理由国外疫区量体温就能进京，健康的湖北人直接禁止入京。42身份证不携带病毒        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B1%E4%BA%AC%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E5%8F%AF%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#由京入境人员什么情况可居家观察#</a>？】北京市市委组织部副部长张革：①70周岁以上老人、未成年人、孕产妇等不适于集中隔离观察的②有单独住所，且无其他同住人员的。申请居家观察人员入境前，本人或家人应主动与居住地社区联系，并签订居家观察告知书，病人、老人、儿童允许一名陪护人照看。拒绝医学 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IySZOccuG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483145602907966:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483145602907966&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4483142934983090" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IySVvkUkq?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 16:40" date="1584348031000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483142934983090:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 16:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC4%E4%BE%8B%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%9B%9E%E5%9B%BD%E5%89%8D%E5%B7%B2%E5%8F%91%E7%83%AD%23&amp;from=default">#北京4例输入病例回国前已发热#</a> 仍坐长途航班】北京今天召开发布会，通报了15日的4例境外输入确诊病例情况：其中蔡某某（男，40岁，从意大利经德国回京），出现发热后在乘机前自行服药退热；陈某（女，23岁，从意大利经莫斯科回京）、吴某某（男，40岁，从西班牙回京）在回国前出现发热等症状，仍乘 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IySVvkUkq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483142934983090:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483142934983090&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【转发周知！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E7%9E%92%E6%8A%A5%E7%97%85%E6%83%85%E5%8F%AF%E5%85%A5%E5%88%91%23&amp;from=default">#入境瞒报病情可入刑#</a>】目前，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%86%E6%B5%B7%E7%A9%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%97%A5%E5%9D%8712%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BA%E6%AC%A1%23&amp;from=default">#陆海空入境人员日均12万人次#</a>，严防境外输入是重中之重。16日，五部门联合发布《关于进一步加强国境卫生检疫工作 依法惩治妨害国境卫生检疫违法犯罪的意见》，明确以下六类行为↓↓↓将以妨害国境卫生检疫罪定罪处罚。切勿心怀侥幸蒙混过关！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#北京疫情防控工作发布会#</a>】今天0时至14时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E6%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9E%8B%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京新增6例境外输入型病例#</a>。北京召开疫情防控新闻发布会，北京市发改委、北京市交通委、北京市疾控中心、北京市社区防控组、北京市公安局将解读最新疫情，并答记者问。关注！（总台央视记者何畅 危家煦） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483133250428767:1034-video:1034%3A4483467312824329:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483133250428767:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zCQlxe" alt="http://t.cn/A6zCQlxe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5932403286&amp;cid=4483135540433555&amp;nick=既来之则安之zzz&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 16:11</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483127429244812" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IySwuCMZS?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 15:38" date="1584344333000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483127429244812:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 15:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E6%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9E%8B%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京新增6例境外输入型病例#</a>：西班牙4例、英国2例】3月16日0时至14时，北京无新增报告本地新冠肺炎确诊病例，出院病例2例。累计报告本地确诊病例415例，出院358例，治愈出院率达到86.3%。新增境外输入病例6例，其中西班牙4例、英国2例。累计报告境外输入确诊病例37例，出院2例。（总台央视记者牟媞 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IySwuCMZS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483127429244812:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483127429244812&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E9%9D%A2%E5%AF%B9%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#央视新闻面对面#</a>【中央指导组专家组成员邱海波：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%B4%E5%BA%8A%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%B0%B1%E8%AF%A5%E5%9C%A8%E7%97%85%E5%BA%8A%E8%BE%B9%23&amp;from=default">#临床医生就该在病床边#</a>】在武汉一线，邱海波的身份不仅是指导组专家，更是临床医生。不论是俯卧位通气这样的力气活，还是充满危险的气管插管，他都会亲自上阵。他说，这样可以给医护人员更多信心，“临床医生就该在床边，我希望能给病人更多生的机会！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IySlj7jnF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483120491742799:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483120491742799&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【痛心！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2330%E5%B2%81%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%80%92%E5%9C%A8%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#30岁民警倒在抗疫一线#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6c/2018new_xinsui_org.png" title="[伤心]" alt="[伤心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】昨天12时许，四川阿坝红原县森林公安局，年仅30岁的民警阿真能周，在完成通宵防疫卡点执勤任务后，因劳累过度引发疾病在派出所备勤室不幸牺牲。转发送别！（总台央视记者黄鹂） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4483102003305255" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyRRudRQz?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 13:57" date="1584338272000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483102003305255:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 13:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%BA%E5%9C%BA%E4%BA%BA%E6%BB%A1%E4%B8%BA%E6%82%A3%E5%A4%9A%E6%95%B0%E6%9C%AA%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#美国机场人满为患多数未戴口罩#</a>】美国近日宣布对欧洲实施旅行禁令后，要求欧洲返美乘客只能从全美的13个指定机场之一入境。多座机场的入关通道因此排起长队，大量乘客滞留，等待接受入境检查。美媒报道称，机场一片混乱，也没有采取防护措施；候检旅客大多未佩戴口罩，民众担心会引发聚集感染。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyRRudRQz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483102003305255:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483102003305255&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483096814664625" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyRJ7jztT?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 13:37" date="1584337035000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483096814664625:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 13:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8C%AA%E5%A8%81%E8%BF%9D%E5%8F%8D%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%A6%81%E4%BB%A4%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E5%8F%AF%E5%88%A44%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#挪威违反防疫禁令最高可判4年#</a>】据挪威媒体报道，挪威颁布了严格的惩罚措施，违反国家或市级预防新冠肺炎感染禁令的人，最高判处四年有期徒刑。截至当地时间15日20时，挪威累计确诊1234例新冠肺炎，死亡3例。（总台记者郝晓丽） ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IyRJ7jztT&amp;mid=4483096814664625&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcvpo2om5uj20go0gogvn" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>193</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609489771&amp;ssig=S2hHyLyhIY" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483093102521824" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyRD8aA2A?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 13:22" date="1584336150000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483093102521824:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 13:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E6%97%B6%E4%BB%A3%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E6%98%AF%E5%A0%AA%E5%BD%93%E5%A4%A7%E4%BB%BB%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#新时代的中国青年是堪当大任的#</a>【习近平给北京大学援鄂医疗队全体“90后”党员回信】“在新冠肺炎疫情防控斗争中，你们青年人同在一线英勇奋战的广大疫情防控人员一道，不畏艰险、冲锋在前、舍生忘死，彰显了青春的蓬勃力量，交出了合格答卷。广大青年用行动证明，新时代的中国青年是好样的，是堪当大 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyRqKanj2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483085422472872:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483085422472872&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="spec_box clearfix">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉日记#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E6%88%BF%E9%87%8C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%B0%B1%E6%98%AF%E5%BD%BC%E6%AD%A4%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%B2%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#重症病房里我们就是彼此的亲人#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】武汉协和医院西院湘雅重症病房里，医护人员与患者结成“临时家属”。支援武汉的湖南护士付秦辉说，重症患者缺少安全感，精神上的安慰对他们很重要；同时，这也让远在他乡的医护人员内心有了归属。“我要把病人平安送回家，然后自己再平安回家。”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyRkl2Olr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483081450670185:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483081450670185&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            </ul>
        </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                                                                                                        【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2313%E5%9C%B0%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%BD%92%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#13地现有确诊病例归零#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/9f/2018new_jiayou_org.png" title="[加油]" alt="[加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】截至16日11时，西藏、青海、福建、新疆（含兵团）、安徽、江西、山西、湖南、江苏、重庆、天津、吉林、贵州现有确诊病例为零！不懈怠、不放松、不扎堆，严防境外输入，继续加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5639312171&amp;cid=4483077306603712&amp;nick=哆拉V梦ww&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                                                                          【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" 加油！】国家卫健委医政医管局监察专员焦雅辉：2月18日，武汉的在院患者是28000多人，重症加在一起有9000多人，那时的累计治愈率只有9.9%。今天的在院患者还有8200多人，重症和危重症加在一起2800多人，累计治愈率已达到75.3%。所以，可以说我们现在已经进入到了冲刺 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" title=\"可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录\">已编辑<\/span>\n                                                <\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"央视新闻\">\n                                                                                                                        <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%82%A1%E4%B8%A4%E5%91%A8%E4%B8%89%E6%AC%A1%E7%86%94%E6%96%AD%23&from=default\">#美股两周三次熔断#<\/a>【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%82%A1%E5%86%8D%E6%AC%A1%E7%86%94%E6%96%AD%23&from=default\">#美股再次熔断#<\/a>】美国三大股指16日开盘暴跌，标普500指数跌幅超过7%，触发熔断机制，停盘15分钟。这是美股两周以来第三次熔断。投资机构纷纷对市场前景表示悲观，高盛预测，下跌远未结束，预计标普500指数可能从最高点下跌41%至2000点左右。（央视记者王逢治）                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"
